name: Dan-Gun
meaning: Dan-Gun is named after the holy Dan-Gun, the legendary founder of Korea in 2333 B.C.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 9 o'clock. Step into right L-stance. Perform middle knife-hand guarding block.

moves.title: High stance punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 9 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform high punch.

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees right to face 3 o'clock. Step into left L-stance. Perform knife-hand guarding block.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 3 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform high punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Step into left walking stance. Perform low outer forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so najunde bakat palmok makgi

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform high punch.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 12 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform high punch.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform high punch.

moves.title: Twin outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 270 degrees left to face 3 o'clock. Step into right L-stance. Perform twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 3 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform high punch.

moves.title: Twin outer forearm block
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees right to face 9 o'clock. Step into left L-stance. Perform twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 9 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform high punch.

moves.title: Low outer forearm block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 6 o'clock. Step into left walking stance. Perform low outer forearm block.
moves.korean: gunnun so najunde bakat palmok makgi

moves.title: Rising block
moves.description: Remain in left walking stance. Perform rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Rising block
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Rising block
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Rising block
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Knife-hand strike
moves.description: Pivot 270 degrees left to face 3 o'clock. Step into right L-stance. Perform knife-hand side strike.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 3 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform high punch.

moves.title: Knife-hand strike
moves.description: Pivot 180 degrees right to face 9 o'clock. Step into left L-stance. Perform knife-hand side strike.

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Step forward facing 9 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform high punch.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Return to parallel ready stance.
